extends Overlay

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UpgradeOverlay()
      Constructs an overlay that exists to offer and perform roboticon upgrades This table also displays roboticons' levels and tiles' yields to help players make more informed upgrades

    • Constructor Detail

      • UpgradeOverlay

        public UpgradeOverlay()
        Constructs an overlay that exists to offer and perform roboticon upgrades This table also displays roboticons' levels and tiles' yields to help players make more informed upgrades

    • Method Detail

      • setYieldLabelText

        public void setYieldLabelText(ResourceType resource,
                              int yield)
        Encodes one of the three yield ratings of the most recently-selected tile in its associated label object within the overlay
        Parameters:
        resource - A resource which is yielded by the most recently-selected tile
        yield - The quantity of a particular resource's units that are yielded by the most recently-selected tile at the end of each turn

      • setRoboticonLevelLabelText

        public void setRoboticonLevelLabelText(ResourceType resource,
                                       int level)
        Encodes one of the three ratings of the most recently-selected tile's bound roboticon in its associated label object within the overlay
        Parameters:
        resource - A resource which is yielded by the most recently-selected tile
        level - The level to which the most recently-selected tile's bound roboticon has been set in harvesting units of the specified resource

      • setUpgradeButtonFunction

        public void setUpgradeButtonFunction(ResourceType resource,
                                     com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.ChangeListener event)
        Sets the functions of the buttons that were made to process roboticon upgrade requests
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource-type pertaining to the roboticon upgrade type that the targeted button was made to process
        event - The function to be assigned to the targeted button

      • setUpgradeButtonLabelText

        public void setUpgradeButtonLabelText(ResourceType resource,
                                      java.lang.String text)
        Sets the text to be encoded by the labels bound to the overlay's roboticon upgrade buttons This is used by the GameEngine class to label those buttons with the prices of the transactions that they perform
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource-type pertaining to the roboticon upgrade type that the targeted button was made to process
        text - The text to be encoded and deployed as the targeted button's visual representation

      • toggleUpgradeButton

        public void toggleUpgradeButton(ResourceType resource,
                                boolean enabled,
                                com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
        Enables/disables the buttons in the overlay that serve to process roboticon upgrade requests
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource-type pertaining to the roboticon upgrade type that the targeted button was made to process
        enabled - Determines whether the targeted button is to be enabled or disabled
        color - The colour in which the targeted button's label will now be rendered

      • setCloseUpgradeOverlayButtonFunction

        public void setCloseUpgradeOverlayButtonFunction(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.ChangeListener event)
        Sets the function of the button that was made to allow players to close the overlay
        Parameters:
        event - The function to be assigned to the overlay's internal closeUpgradeOverlayButton object
